resources.string: To help you make the most impact, we’d like to send you two kinds of notifications:

1. Countdown reminders up to the 1@1 action on Jan. 21.\n\n2. The 1@1 Action Plan after Jan. 21. Each week for a year, you’ll receive a 1-minute video of an easy action to take that, when multiplied by thousands of people, can create real change.
